item.title: State of My Life Address
item.description: 11:11 Wednesday 04 September 2019 JST Yesterday I walked from Shinjuku to Hiroo, from the men’s group new meeting location to our old one. Last night we met for the last time at Takeshi’s office, and next week we will be in Shinjuku, at a place I have not yet seen. I have booked it for all of September and October, and trust we can get it for longer if we like it.
